scripts.prebuild: esbuild src/main/parsers.ts src/utils/settings.ts --outdir=src --out-extension:.js=.cjs --format=cjs --platform=node && esbuild src/main/parsers.ts --outfile=release/app/dist/main/parsers.cjs --format=cjs --platform=node && npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:main-local
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer
scripts.build: npm run prepack:app && npm run build:prod
scripts.start: npm run prebuild && npm run build:renderer && electron .
scripts.dev: npm run prebuild && concurrently -k -s first -n "VITE,ELECTRON" -c "cyan,magenta" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development vite --open=false" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron ."
scripts.test: tsx ./scripts/smoke-parse.ts && tsx ./scripts/test-msg-filter.ts && node ./scripts/verify-mdc-flow.mjs && tsx ./scripts/test-elastic-indexer.ts && tsx ./scripts/test-log-data-store.ts && tsx ./scripts/test-tcp-socket-cleanup.ts && tsx ./scripts/test-http-poller-memory.ts && tsx ./scripts/test-robustness-features.ts && tsx ./scripts/test-adaptive-batch.ts && tsx ./scripts/test-stability-services.ts && tsx ./scripts/test-new-services.ts
scripts.test:e2e: npm run prebuild && npx playwright test
scripts.test:e2e:headed: npm run prebuild && npx playwright test --headed
scripts.test:e2e:debug: npm run prebuild && npx playwright test --debug
scripts.build:x64: npm run prepack:app && npm run build:prod && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win nsis --x64
scripts.build:portable: npm run prepack:app && npm run build:prod && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win portable
scripts.build:portable:x64: npm run prepack:app && npm run build:prod && cross-env CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --win portable --x64
scripts.build:mac:dmg: npm run prepack:app && npm run build:prod && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_DISABLE_PUBLISH=true CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --mac dmg --publish never
